scripts.dev: npm run purs:build && npm run purs:serve
scripts.build: npm run purs:build && npm run purs:bundle
scripts.purs:bundle: mkdir -p dist && npx esbuild output/Main/index.js --bundle --outfile=dist/app.js --format=iife && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let c=fs.readFileSync('dist/app.js','utf8'); c=c.replace(/var main2 = /g,'var main = '); const m=c.match(/var (main) = .*runHalogenAff/); if(m){c+='\n'+m[1]+'();'; fs.writeFileSync('dist/app.js',c); console.log('Added main() execution');} else {console.error('Main function not found');}"
